articles.author: Ruxandra Iordache, Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: Vodafone, CK Hutchison agree UK mobile business merger - CNBC
articles.description: Talks have been ongoing since last year.
articles.content:
Vodafone and CK Hutchison, which owns the Three UK mobile network, agreed to merge their U.K. businesses, following talks that have been ongoing since last year, the companies said Wednesday.
